welcome.success_message: You've successfully created a project with {vite} + {vue}.

documentation.title: Documentation
documentation.description: Vue's {documentation} provides you with all information you need to get started.

tooling.title: Tooling
tooling.description: This project is served and bundled with {vite}. The recommended IDE setup is {ide} + {vs}. If you need to test your components and web pages, check out {vitest} and {cypress} / {playwright}.

ecosystem.title: Ecosystem
ecosystem.description: Get official tools and libraries for your project: {pinia}, {vue_router}, {vue_test_utils}, and {vue_dev_tools}. If you need more resources, we suggest paying {awesome_vue} a visit.

community.title: Community
community.description: Got stuck? Ask your question on {vue_land} (our official Discord server), or {stackoverflow}. You should also follow the official {bluesky} Bluesky account or the {twitter} X account for latest news in the Vue world.

support.title: Support Vue
support.description: As an independent project, Vue relies on community backing for its sustainability. You can help us by {becoming_sponsor}.
